verses.roman:
punarapi eka-bāra āsiha nīlācale"
eta bali' kaṇṭha-mālā dilā tāṅra gale

synonyms: punarapi—again, also; eka-bāra—once; āsiha nīlācale—come to Jagannātha Purī; eta bali'-saying this; kaṇṭha-mālā—neck beads; dilā—gave; tāṅra gale—on his neck.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu concluded, "Come again to Nīlācala [Jagannātha Purī]." After saying this, the Lord put His own neck beads on Raghunātha Bhaṭṭa's neck.
